headline: Old Dominion Posts Weak LTL Unit Performance for November
summary: ODFL reports revenue per day decline of 8.2% year over year in November 2024 due to an 8% decrease in LTL tons per day and a slight decrease in LTL revenue per hundredweight.

raw.headline: Old Dominion Posts Weak LTL Unit Performance for November
raw.summary: ODFL reports revenue per day decline of 8.2% year over year in November 2024 due to an 8% decrease in LTL tons per day and a slight decrease in LTL revenue per hundredweight.

headline: XPO, Old Dominion waiting for market turn
summary: XPO and Old Dominion reported tonnage declines in November, but both appear to be anticipating a market recovery. The post XPO, Old Dominion waiting for market turn appeared first on FreightWaves.
